author: haddadc
msg: 1) added missing items and marked as NR (not rated - for mature audiences only) to denote that we haven't prioritized the item.
2) marked items as closed per bugzilla.
3) added "better support for SOAP Headers" as a future enhancement.

author: stevel
msg: added reading list web page (and more detailed .bib for latex users)...maybe we could have some XML metaformat (RDF?) and XSLT out everything. More contribs welcome.

author: seibert
msg: There is a limitation on Winblows with the jar files being in the classpath,
and being able to remove them. So, for now, I need to not directly reference
axis-ant.jar, but instead simply include the build/tools path in the classpath

author: scheu
msg: SOAPPart.getAsBytes was setting the current message to FORM_STRING instead
of FORM_BYTES for the cases where the message is a FORM_SOAPENVELOPE or
FORM_FAULT.
This caused some performance hits when the message was retrieved later and
had to convert the string to a byte[] a second time.  Also notice that the
comments in getContentLength imply that the byte form should be cached by
getAsBytes.
